languages.text: Each stack inflicts a −10 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligence{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g}. The effect will be removed at the end of combat. If gained outside of combat, visit the voidship to remove.
languages.original_text: Каждый уровень эффекта дает {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}штраф{/g} −10 к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Ближнему Бою{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Дальнему Бою{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Интеллекту{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Восприятию{/g}. Эффект будет снят по окончании боя. Если эффект получен вне боя, для его снятия необходимо вернуться на корабль.

traits.locale_text: Each stack grants a −10 penalty to any Ballistic Skill, Weapon Skill, Intelligence, and Perception tests. The effect will be removed at the end of combat. If gained outside of combat, visit the voidship to remove.

Each stack inflicts a −10 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligence{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g}. The effect will be removed at the end of combat. If gained outside of combat, visit the voidship to remove.

Each stack inflicts a −10 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligence{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g}. The effect will be removed at the end of combat. If gained outside of combat, visit the voidship to remove.

Each stack inflicts a −10 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to any {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligence{/g}, or {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Test}tests{/g}. The effect will be removed at the end of combat. If gained outside of combat, visit the voidship to remove.

languages.text: Jeder Stapel verursacht einen {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}Abzug{/g} von -10 auf {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistik-Fähigkeit{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Waffenfähigkeit{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligenz{/g} oder {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Wahrnehmung{/g}. Der Effekt wird bei Kampfende entfernt. Wurde er außerhalb des Kampfes erhalten, kann er im Raumschiff entfernt werden.
languages.original_text: Each stack inflicts a −10 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligence{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g}. The effect will be removed at the end of combat. If gained outside of combat, visit the voidship to remove.

traits.locale_text: Jeder aufaddierte Effekt führt zu einem {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}Abzug{/g} von −10 auf jede Probe für {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistik-Fertigkeit{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Waffenfertigkeit{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligenz{/g} oder {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Wahrnehmung{/g}. Der Effekt wird bei Kampfende entfernt. Sollte er außerhalb des Kampfes erlangt worden sein, kann er im Raumschiff entfernt werden.

languages.text: Chaque cumul inflige une {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}pénalité{/g} de −10 de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Capacité de tir{/g}, de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Capacité de combat{/g}, d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligence{/g} ou de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g}. L'effet se dissipera à la fin du combat. S'il est obtenu en dehors du combat, le personnage doit se rendre à bord du vaisseau spatial pour s'en débarrasser.
languages.original_text: Each stack inflicts a −10 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligence{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g}. The effect will be removed at the end of combat. If gained outside of combat, visit the voidship to remove.

traits.locale_text: Chaque cumul inflige une {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}pénalité{/g} de −10 aux {g|Encyclopedia:Test}tests{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Capacité de tir{/g}, de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Capacité de combat{/g}, d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligence{/g} ou de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g}. L'effet se dissipera à la fin du combat. S'il est obtenu en dehors du combat, le personnage doit se rendre à bord du vaisseau spatial pour s'en débarrasser.

languages.text: 每层效果都会使所有{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}弹道技能{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}武器技能{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}智力{/g}与{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}感知{/g}检定承受-10{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}减值{/g}。 此效果会在战斗结束时移除。如果是在战斗之外获得此效果，则需要前往虚空舰才能移除。
languages.original_text: Each stack inflicts a −10 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligence{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g}. The effect will be removed at the end of combat. If gained outside of combat, visit the voidship to remove.

traits.locale_text: 每层效果都会使所有{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}弹道技能{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}武器技能{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}智力{/g}与{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}感知{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Test}检定{/g}承受-10{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}减值{/g}。 此效果会在战斗结束时移除。如果是在战斗之外获得此效果，则需要前往虚空舰才能移除。

languages.text: Cada acumulación inflige una {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalización{/g} de −10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Habilidad de proyectiles{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Habilidad de armas{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Inteligencia{/g} o {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Percepción{/g}. El efecto termina al final del combate. Si lo has sufrido fuera del combate, visita la nave del vacío para eliminarlo.
languages.original_text: Each stack inflicts a −10 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligence{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g}. The effect will be removed at the end of combat. If gained outside of combat, visit the voidship to remove.

traits.locale_text: Cada acumulación inflige una {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalización{/g} de -10 a cualquier prueba de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Habilidad de proyectiles{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Habilidad de armas{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Inteligencia{/g} o {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Percepción{/g}. El efecto termina al final del combate. Si lo has sufrido fuera del combate, visita la nave del vacío para eliminarlo.

languages.text: 1スタックごとに、すべての{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}BS{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}WS{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}INT{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}PER{/g}に−10の{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}ペナルティ{/g}を受ける。 この効果は戦闘終了時に解除される。戦闘外で付与された場合は、ヴォイドシップに行くことで解除される。
languages.original_text: Each stack inflicts a −10 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligence{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g}. The effect will be removed at the end of combat. If gained outside of combat, visit the voidship to remove.

traits.locale_text: 1スタックごとに、すべての{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}弾道スキル{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}武器スキル{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}知性{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}知覚{/g}判定に-10の{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}ペナルティ{/g}を受ける。 この効果は戦闘終了時に解除される。戦闘外で付与された場合は、ヴォイドシップに行くことで解除される。

languages.text: Каждый уровень эффекта дает {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}штраф{/g} −10 к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Ближнему Бою{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Дальнему Бою{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Интеллекту{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Восприятию{/g}. Эффект будет снят по окончании боя. Если эффект получен вне боя, для его снятия необходимо вернуться на корабль.
languages.original_text: Each stack inflicts a −10 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligence{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g}. The effect will be removed at the end of combat. If gained outside of combat, visit the voidship to remove.

traits.locale_text: Каждый уровень эффекта дает {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}штраф{/g} −10 при любых проверках {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Дальнего Боя{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Ближнего Боя{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Интеллекта{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Восприятия{/g}. Эффект будет снят по окончании боя. Если эффект получен вне боя, для его снятия необходимо вернуться на корабль.

Каждый уровень эффекта дает {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}штраф{/g} −10 при любых проверках {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Дальнего Боя{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Ближнего Боя{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Интеллекта{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Восприятия{/g}. Эффект будет снят по окончании боя. Если эффект получен вне боя, для его снятия необходимо вернуться на корабль.

languages.text: Her birikim, her türlü {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Balistik Yetenek{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Silah Yeteneği{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Zekâ{/g} veya {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Algı{/g} −10 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}ceza puanı{/g} verir. Bu etki, çatışmanın sonunda kalkar. Etkiye çatışma dışında maruz kalındıysa, gidermek için uçsuz gemisine uğra.
languages.original_text: Each stack inflicts a −10 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligence{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g}. The effect will be removed at the end of combat. If gained outside of combat, visit the voidship to remove.
